h2-header: Certified massage therapist in Lagos Portugal
about-content: Hello, I am Tania and welcome to Bliss Massage. I am a certified English massage therapist for 25 years based in Lagos Portugal. I am bi-lingual speaking both English and Portuguese. If you need any help or have any questions then please send me a message or call me.
services-description: Here are my massage therapies and prices.
faq-answer1: I work in a salon space in Lagos (Praia da Luz) called The Holistic Hub.
faq-question2: How much does a massage cost?
faq-answer2: I offer different massage services to each need. If you have any doubts then send me a message or call me.
faq-question3: Do you have any special offers for massages?
faq-answer3: I regularly update my latest offers so send me a message or call me for more information about my latest offer.
faq-question4: Do you have any COVID19 rules?
faq-answer4: The salon is deeply cleaned before all massage therapy is done. I work using a mask at all times and ask that you also wear a mask too at all times for safety.
faq-question5: Is this massage therapy Female or Male only?
faq-answer5: I work with both men and women to each of their needs.
